name: Running Cube (NickelDan)
description:
This is my first ever game uploaded and was made only using Unity. Currently my skills aren't the best so most of this was made following a tutorial but I promise once I learn more I'll make my own y e s

Controls:

A & D = left and right

(Since this is in the web and not solo the "Quit" button doesn't work so if you want to leave then just go the main page of the itch.io or if you want to retry whole game then restart)
